name: Opposite Reaction
description:
Opposite Reaction was created for GamesPlusJam2, in 7 days.

You are a low level security guard, you find yourself trapped on a space station and the gravity is off, you have to make your way through the station to find out what happened, on the way you encounter strange spike looking things and the stations security turret doesn’t seem to recognise you.

The game currently only have two levels, a tutorial level and a main level.  I might add some more level and better art, but have to see what I have time for in the future. 

Controls:

  • Aim - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left Mouse
  • Change Weapon - Mouse Scroll wheel
  • Pause - Escape

External Assets:

  • Music: Deep In Space by Rene Breitbarth from UnityStore
  • WebGL Template: Responsive WebGL by Simmer.io from UnityStore
  • Plugin: DoTween by DEMIGIANT from UnityStore

Programs used:

  • Unity 2019.3
  • Visual Studio
  • Audacity
  • Paint.net
